metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3552 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the IP implementation in the Linux kernel before 3.0might allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (slab corruptionand system crash) by sending packets to an application that sets socketoptions during the handling of network traffic.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3552` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.11.0-12-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-extra-3.11.0-12-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-1-goldfish - 3.4.0-1.7
No subscription required

linux-image-3.1.10-8-grouper - 3.1.10-8.28
No subscription required

linux-image-3.0.0-3-maguro - 3.0.0-3.18
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-3-mako - 3.4.0-3.21
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-4-manta - 3.4.0-4.19
No subscription required

linux-image-3.4.0-1-flo - 3.4.0-1.3
No subscription required
